It's an engaging and well-crafted film that might fascinate you.

If you're in the mood for something more action-packed, I'd recommend "The Expendables 2". It's a thrilling ride that's sure to keep you entertained!

I think I have just the right recommendations for you!

Considering the epic and mystic vibes you got from Elizabeth, I'd like to suggest "Eve's Bayou" (1997) - it's a hauntingly beautiful film that explores the complexities of family secrets and mystic forces, set against the backdrop of Louisiana's bayous. The all-star cast, including Lynn Whitfield and Diahann Carroll, will keep you engaged.

If you're in the mood for something with a similar sense of mystery and wonder, I'd also recommend "1900" (1976) - this Italian epic tells the story of two childhood friends on opposing sides during a tumultuous period in Italy's history. Robert De Niro stars alongside Dominique Sanda and Stefania Sandrelli.

Let me know if you'd like more recommendations!
